channel.title: Nexus 718 run error
channel.description:
Hello fellow moparians, I am the Owner of Hospitality-X and i recently downloaded a source called nexus.
i had problems in the run.bat that said "error: missing 'server' JVM at 'c:\program files\java\jre7\bin\server\jvm.dll'" so i fixed it by instead of using a -server i used -client then i had this error " invalid maximum heap size: -Xmx4096m the specified size exceeds the maximum representable size. Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occured. Program will exit." which was because i was on a 32bit so i fixed it... now this is a error i have and i have no idea how to fix...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBounds Exception: 19 at com.rs.utils.utils.getitemdefinitionssize(utils.java:268) at com.rs.rs.cache.loaders.itemsequipids.init(itemsequipids.java:13) at com.rs.launcher.main(launcher.java:63)

item.title: Nexus 718 run error
item.dc:creator: @thakillah thakillah
item.description:
@thakillah wrote:

@title Running Nexus @echo off echo [Nexus] Server is loading… java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xms512m -Xmx512m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true
pause

I was on my mobile when I did this

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus 718 run error
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You probably need to reinstall java. You shouldn’t get that first error you had. Another thing to note is that the server is allocating 6GB of RAM at startup which is probably completely unnecessary.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus 718 run error
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

well i dont think that you should start with a 317 rsps…Try a 317 man, not to be mean or anything im saying this because there is no point of going into a 718 if u cant fix a little problem

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus 718 run error
item.dc:creator: @1airwolf 1airwolf
item.description:
@1airwolf wrote:

i get the same error here is the run.bat

@title Running Nexus @echo off echo [Nexus] Server is loading.. java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus 718 run error
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

Post your run.bat ill fix for you.

Read full topic
